insert into con_soft_task_rule
cstr_uiid ,
ref_cstsuiid ,
cstr_loccode ,
cstr_idcon1 ,
cstr_idcon2 ,
cstr_titlecon2 ,
cstr_titlecon1 ,
cstr_despcon2 ,

cstr_agtitle2 ,

insert into con_soft_task_rule ( cstr_uiid , ref_cstsuiid , cstr_loccode , cstr_idcon1 , cstr_idcon2 , cstr_titlecon2 , cstr_titlecon1 , cstr_despcon2 , cstr_despcon1 , cstr_claname , cstr_minlevel , cstr_maxlevel , cstr_agloccode , cstr_agidcon1 , cstr_agidcon2 , cstr_agtitle1 , cstr_agtitle2 , cstr_agdesp1 , cstr_agdesp2 , cstr_agclaname , cstr_state , cstr_locrel , cstr_sort ) values
( #{item.uiid} , #{item.cstsuiid} , #{item.loccode} , #{item.idcon1} , #{item.idcon2} , #{item.titlecon2} , #{item.titlecon1} , #{item.despcon2} , #{item.despcon1} , #{item.claname} , #{item.minlevel} , #{item.maxlevel} , #{item.agloccode} , #{item.agidcon1} , #{item.agidcon2} , #{item.agtitle1} , #{item.agtitle2} , #{item.agdesp1} , #{item.agdesp2} , #{item.agclaname} , #{item.state} , #{item.locrel} , #{item.sort} )
mapper.update:
update con_soft_task_rule
ref_cstsuiid = #{cstsuiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
cstr_loccode = #{loccode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
cstr_idcon1 = #{idcon1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
cstr_idcon2 = #{idcon2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
cstr_titlecon2 = #{titlecon2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
cstr_titlecon1 = #{titlecon1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
cstr_despcon2 = #{despcon2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
cstr_despcon1 = #{despcon1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
cstr_claname = #{claname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
cstr_minlevel = #{minlevel,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
cstr_maxlevel = #{maxlevel,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
cstr_agloccode = #{agloccode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
cstr_agidcon1 = #{agidcon1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
cstr_agidcon2 = #{agidcon2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
cstr_agtitle1 = #{agtitle1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
cstr_agtitle2 = #{agtitle2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
cstr_agdesp1 = #{agdesp1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
cstr_agdesp2 = #{agdesp2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
cstr_agclaname = #{agclaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
cstr_state = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR} ,
cstr_locrel = #{locrel,jdbcType=CHAR} ,
cstr_sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}
where cstr_uiid = #{uiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

cstr_loccode = #{item.loccode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,

mapper.select: select * from con_soft_task_rule where cstr_uiid = #{uiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} for update

select count(*) from con_soft_task_rule where 1=1
and cstr_uiid like CONCAT('%',#{uiid},'%' )
and ref_cstsuiid like CONCAT('%',#{cstsuiid},'%' )
and cstr_loccode like CONCAT('%',#{loccode},'%' )
and cstr_idcon1 like CONCAT('%',#{idcon1},'%' )
and cstr_idcon2 like CONCAT('%',#{idcon2},'%' )
and cstr_titlecon2 like CONCAT('%',#{titlecon2},'%' )
and cstr_titlecon1 like CONCAT('%',#{titlecon1},'%' )
and cstr_despcon2 like CONCAT('%',#{despcon2},'%' )
and cstr_despcon1 like CONCAT('%',#{despcon1},'%' )
and cstr_claname like CONCAT('%',#{claname},'%' )
and cstr_minlevel like CONCAT('%',#{minlevel},'%' )
and cstr_maxlevel like CONCAT('%',#{maxlevel},'%' )
and cstr_agloccode like CONCAT('%',#{agloccode},'%' )
and cstr_agidcon1 like CONCAT('%',#{agidcon1},'%' )
and cstr_agidcon2 like CONCAT('%',#{agidcon2},'%' )
and cstr_agtitle1 like CONCAT('%',#{agtitle1},'%' )
and cstr_agtitle2 like CONCAT('%',#{agtitle2},'%' )
and cstr_agdesp1 like CONCAT('%',#{agdesp1},'%' )
and cstr_agdesp2 like CONCAT('%',#{agdesp2},'%' )
and cstr_agclaname like CONCAT('%',#{agclaname},'%' )
and cstr_state like CONCAT('%',#{state},'%' )
and cstr_locrel like CONCAT('%',#{locrel},'%' )
and cstr_sort like CONCAT('%',#{sort},'%' )

select * from con_soft_task_rule where 1=1
and cstr_uiid like CONCAT('%',#{uiid},'%' )
and ref_cstsuiid like CONCAT('%',#{cstsuiid},'%' )
and cstr_loccode like CONCAT('%',#{loccode},'%' )
and cstr_idcon1 like CONCAT('%',#{idcon1},'%' )
and cstr_idcon2 like CONCAT('%',#{idcon2},'%' )
and cstr_titlecon2 like CONCAT('%',#{titlecon2},'%' )
and cstr_titlecon1 like CONCAT('%',#{titlecon1},'%' )
and cstr_despcon2 like CONCAT('%',#{despcon2},'%' )
and cstr_despcon1 like CONCAT('%',#{despcon1},'%' )
and cstr_claname like CONCAT('%',#{claname},'%' )
and cstr_minlevel like CONCAT('%',#{minlevel},'%' )
and cstr_maxlevel like CONCAT('%',#{maxlevel},'%' )
and cstr_agloccode like CONCAT('%',#{agloccode},'%' )
and cstr_agidcon1 like CONCAT('%',#{agidcon1},'%' )
and cstr_agidcon2 like CONCAT('%',#{agidcon2},'%' )
and cstr_agtitle1 like CONCAT('%',#{agtitle1},'%' )
and cstr_agtitle2 like CONCAT('%',#{agtitle2},'%' )
and cstr_agdesp1 like CONCAT('%',#{agdesp1},'%' )
and cstr_agdesp2 like CONCAT('%',#{agdesp2},'%' )
and cstr_agclaname like CONCAT('%',#{agclaname},'%' )
and cstr_state like CONCAT('%',#{state},'%' )
and cstr_locrel like CONCAT('%',#{locrel},'%' )
and cstr_sort like CONCAT('%',#{sort},'%' )
order by cstr_sort asc

select * from con_soft_task_rule where 1=2
or cstr_uiid like CONCAT('%',#{uiid},'%' )
or ref_cstsuiid like CONCAT('%',#{cstsuiid},'%' )
or cstr_loccode like CONCAT('%',#{loccode},'%' )
or cstr_idcon1 like CONCAT('%',#{idcon1},'%' )
or cstr_idcon2 like CONCAT('%',#{idcon2},'%' )
or cstr_titlecon2 like CONCAT('%',#{titlecon2},'%' )
or cstr_titlecon1 like CONCAT('%',#{titlecon1},'%' )
or cstr_despcon2 like CONCAT('%',#{despcon2},'%' )
or cstr_despcon1 like CONCAT('%',#{despcon1},'%' )
or cstr_claname like CONCAT('%',#{claname},'%' )
or cstr_minlevel like CONCAT('%',#{minlevel},'%' )
or cstr_maxlevel like CONCAT('%',#{maxlevel},'%' )
or cstr_agloccode like CONCAT('%',#{agloccode},'%' )
or cstr_agidcon1 like CONCAT('%',#{agidcon1},'%' )
or cstr_agidcon2 like CONCAT('%',#{agidcon2},'%' )
or cstr_agtitle1 like CONCAT('%',#{agtitle1},'%' )
or cstr_agtitle2 like CONCAT('%',#{agtitle2},'%' )
or cstr_agdesp1 like CONCAT('%',#{agdesp1},'%' )
or cstr_agdesp2 like CONCAT('%',#{agdesp2},'%' )
or cstr_agclaname like CONCAT('%',#{agclaname},'%' )
or cstr_state like CONCAT('%',#{state},'%' )
or cstr_locrel like CONCAT('%',#{locrel},'%' )
or cstr_sort like CONCAT('%',#{sort},'%' )
order by cstr_sort asc
